value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|*yawn* Whew! I must have fallen
immediately asleep last night...$k$pI guess I must have eaten too much
of that food Princess Nótt made.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Princess Reginn! ...Princess Reginn?
Commander, have you seen Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|She isn't in her room?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No. Nor is she anywhere else nearby
as far as I can tell... No one seems to
have seen her since last night.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What? Do you know anything about
this, $Nu?$k$p$EFace_Pain|She went to the Tower of Niðavellir?
And she went alone?!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What?! She did say she felt bad
about the damage Fáfnir caused...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|And on top of that—and this is just
a guess, but—she probably can't
stand seeing her brother suffer...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Regardless of her reasons, it's far too
dangerous for her to go there alone.
We have to go after her!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ジーク,ch10_31_Zeke_M_Normal,Face|Her face is dim, but it is there,
etched in the recesses of memory...
the face of my...my...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Guhhh...$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fo500,0,0,0,255|$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_04,0|$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|Well now, King Fáfnir... Quite the
pathetic state you've found yourself
in here, isn't it?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Who...who are you?!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|My name is Loki. Enchanted, I'm sure.
Pleasantries aside, you seem to be in
quite the predicament, hm?$k$pI wanted to offer my help.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hah. What help can you, a stranger,
possibly have to offer me?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Oh... So you don't believe I can help
you then? Well that's just hurtful!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fo500,0,0,0,255|$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi500|Do you question whether I am
concerned for you, Brother?$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What is—$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fo500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi500|Fáfnir... Brother... I'm sorry you've
been imprisoned! I'll find a way to
help you!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fo500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|$Fi500|...And what do you suppose I have
to offer you now? Freeing you from
this place would be child's play.$k$pHowever... Freedom has its price.
So, listen closely now, King Fáfnir...
I need you to do something for me.$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Sbs150|
